00046 class SIM_API cComponentType : public cNoncopyableOwnedObject
00047 {
00048   protected:
00049     std::string qualifiedName;
00050     bool availabilityTested;
00051     bool available;
00052 
00053     typedef std::map<std::string, cParImpl *> StringToParMap;
00054     StringToParMap sharedParMap;
00055 
00056     struct Less {bool operator()(cParImpl *a, cParImpl *b) const;};
00057     typedef std::set<cParImpl *, Less> ParImplSet;
00058     ParImplSet sharedParSet;
00059 
00060   protected:
00061     friend class cComponent;
00062     friend class cModule;
00063     friend class cChannel;
00064     friend class cPar;
00065     friend class cGate;
00066 
00067     // internal: returns the properties for this component.
00068     virtual cProperties *getProperties() const = 0;
00069 
00070     // internal: returns the properties of parameter
00071     virtual cProperties *getParamProperties(const char *paramName) const = 0;
00072 
00073     // internal: returns the properties of gate
00074     virtual cProperties *getGateProperties(const char *gateName) const = 0;
00075 
00076     // internal: returns the properties of a submodule.
00077     // (Subcomponent type is needed because with the NED "like" syntax,
00078     // we need the runtime type not the NED type of the submodule.)
00079     virtual cProperties *getSubmoduleProperties(const char *submoduleName, const char *submoduleType) const = 0;
00080 
00081     // internal: returns the properties of a contained connection.
00082     // (Subcomponent type is needed because with the NED "like" syntax,
00083     // we need the runtime type not the NED type of the submodule.)
00084     virtual cProperties *getConnectionProperties(int connectionId, const char *channelType) const = 0;
00085 
00086     // internal: returns the name of the C++ class that implements this NED type
00087     virtual const char *getImplementationClassName() const = 0;
00088 
00089     // internal: sharedParMap access
00090     cParImpl *getSharedParImpl(const char *key) const;
00091     void putSharedParImpl(const char *key, cParImpl *value);
00092 
00093     // internal: sharedParSet access
00094     cParImpl *getSharedParImpl(cParImpl *p) const;
00095     void putSharedParImpl(cParImpl *p);
00096 
00097   public:
00098     // internal: delegates to the similar NedTypeInfo method
00099     virtual std::string getPackageProperty(const char *name) const {return "";}
00100 
00101     // internal: checks whether this type is available; currently tests the existence of the implementation class
00102     virtual bool isAvailable();
00103 
00104     // internal: delegates to the similar NedTypeInfo method
00105     virtual bool isInnerType() const {return false;}
00106 
00107   public:
00113     cComponentType(const char *qname=NULL);
00114 
00118     virtual ~cComponentType();
00120 
00139     virtual const char *getFullName() const  {return qualifiedName.c_str();}
00141 
00146     static cComponentType *find(const char *qname);
00147 
00152     static cComponentType *get(const char *qname);
00153 };

00163 class SIM_API cModuleType : public cComponentType
00164 {
00165     friend class cModule;
00166     friend class cCompoundModule;
00167   protected:
00171     virtual cModule *createModuleObject() = 0;
00172 
00179     virtual void addParametersAndGatesTo(cModule *mod) = 0;
00180 
00187     virtual void setupGateVectors(cModule *mod) = 0;
00188 
00198     virtual void buildInside(cModule *mod) = 0;
00199 
00205     cModule *instantiateModuleClass(const char *classname);
00206 
00207   public:
00213     cModuleType(const char *qname=NULL);
00215 
00221     virtual bool isNetwork() const = 0;
00222 
00226     virtual bool isSimple() const = 0;
00228 
00231 
00238     virtual cModule *create(const char *name, cModule *parentmod);
00239 
00245     virtual cModule *create(const char *name, cModule *parentmod, int vectorsize, int index);
00246 
00260     virtual cModule *createScheduleInit(const char *name, cModule *parentmod);
00262 
00267     static cModuleType *find(const char *qname);
00268 
00273     static cModuleType *get(const char *qname);
00274 };
